channel.title: Kollektor on Andy Dyer
channel.description: Recent content in Kollektor on Andy Dyer

item.title: Introducing Kollektor
item.description: Why a new app? When I first decided to get into Android development, I created the Music Library app to catalog my vinyl collection. It served me well as I learned the ins and outs of Android programming including content providers, interacting with other applications via intents, working with the file system to save/load images, making API requests, etc. In order to test the workings of the Android app market, I published the ad supported Music Library Free and the paid Music Library versions of the app.
